account_code_blocks.name: Sample ABM at Stream Level
account_code_blocks.content:
<script>window.updatedABMstreams2020 = window.updatedABMstreams2020 || [];
window.streamInfo2020 = window.streamInfo2020 || {};       
const on = {{stream_app_on}};
window.streamAppOn = on;
const stream_id = Hubs.appInstance.currentCollectionId;
if(on === true) {
  window.updatedABMstreams2020 = [stream_id];
  const csc = [
    {streamId: {{csc_stream_a}}, tabTitle: '{{csc_tab_title_a}}'},
    {streamId: {{csc_stream_b}}, tabTitle: '{{csc_tab_title_b}}'},
    {streamId: {{csc_stream_c}}, tabTitle: '{{csc_tab_title_c}}'},
    {streamId: {{csc_stream_d}}, tabTitle: '{{csc_tab_title_d}}'},
    {streamId: {{csc_stream_e}}, tabTitle: '{{csc_tab_title_e}}'}
  ];
    
  window.streamInfo2020 = {
    [stream_id]: {
    templateType: "{{template_type}}", 
    industry: "{{industry}}", 
    topHeading: "{{top_heading}}", 
    bottomHeading: "{{bottom_heading}}", 
    subHeading: "{{sub_heading}}.", 
    salesRepId: "{{sales_rep_id}}", 
    showDataBlocks: {{show_data_blocks}}, 
    eventsHeadline: "{{events_headline}}", 
    companySpecificContent: [],
    companyContentTileAmount: {{company_content_tile_amount}}, 
    midPageAdPlacement: {{mid_page_ad_placement}},
    quoteSectionTitle: "{{quote_section_title}}"

    }
  };
  let note = "{{s_rep_pm}}";
  
  if(note !== 'empty'){
    window.salesRepInfo["{{sales_rep_id}}"].repPersonalNote[stream_id] = note;
  }
  csc.forEach((item) => {
    if(item.streamId !== 'empty' && typeof item.streamId === 'number') {
      window.streamInfo2020[stream_id].companySpecificContent.push(item);
    }
  });
};</script>

config_fields.name: stream_app_on
config_fields.label: Apply ABM template
config_fields.description: Toggle on to enable the ABM template.

config_fields.name: template_type
config_fields.label: Template Type
config_fields.description: From the dropdown menu, select the template type

config_fields.name: industry
config_fields.label: Industry
config_fields.description: From the dropdown menu, select the industry.

config_fields.name: top_heading
config_fields.label: Top Heading
config_fields.description: What text would you like displayed in the top heading?

config_fields.name: bottom_heading
config_fields.label: Bottom Heading
config_fields.description: What text would you like displayed in the bottom heading?

config_fields.name: sub_heading
config_fields.label: Sub-Heading
config_fields.description: What text would you like displayed in the sub-heading?
config_fields.default_value: Make data decisions faster and backed by more data and insights than before.

control_props.placeholder: Make data decisions faster and backed by more data and insights than before.

config_fields.name: sales_rep_id
config_fields.label: Sales Rep ID
config_fields.description: Add the Sales Rep's email address [ALL TEXT MUST BE ALL LOWERCASE]

config_fields.name: show_data_blocks
config_fields.label: Show Data Blocks
config_fields.description: Toggle on to see the Data Blocks [CTAs must be added to the stream]

config_fields.name: events_headline
config_fields.label: Events Headline
config_fields.description: What text would you like displayed in the Events' headline?

config_fields.name: company_content_tile_amount
config_fields.label: Number of Company Content Tiles
config_fields.description: How many items would you like displayed in each Company Specific Content section?

config_fields.name: mid_page_ad_placement
config_fields.label: Mid-Page
config_fields.description: Do you want to add a Mid Page ad to this stream?

config_fields.name: quote_section_title
config_fields.label: Quote Section Title
config_fields.description: What would you like the Quote section title to be?

config_fields.name: s_rep_pm
config_fields.label: Sales Rep Personal Message
config_fields.description: What text would you like displayed as a personal message from the Sales Rep?

config_fields.name: csc_stream_a
config_fields.label: Company Specific Content Stream ID 'A'
config_fields.description: Please add the stream ID of the company specific content stream you are adding [NOTE: NUMBERS ONLY].

config_fields.name: csc_tab_title_a
config_fields.label: Tab Title for the company specific content 'A'
config_fields.description: Tab Title to appear beside 'Just For You'

config_fields.name: csc_stream_b
config_fields.label: Company Specific Content Stream ID 'B'
config_fields.description: Please add the stream ID of the company specific content stream you are adding [NOTE: NUMBERS ONLY]

config_fields.description: Tab Title to appear beside 'Just For You'

config_fields.description: Please add the stream ID of the company specific content stream you are adding [NOTE: NUMBERS ONLY]
